title: BCBG Maxazria logo
content: I am trying to recreate this logo and the paperwork I have on it says that the font is "baron plate regular." The thing is, I cannot find this font anywhere on the internet. Can anyone help me out? ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150219021459im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/26233.jpg)
author: julia

comments.content: You might be able to find the logo [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20150219021459/http:/www.logo.nino.ru/) or [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20150219021459/http:/webchantier.free.fr/logotheque/index2.html)

This is clearly some type of [Engravers' Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20150219021459/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/engravers-gothic/). If you remove   
the shade line on [Steelplate Gothic RR](http://web.archive.org/web/20150219021459/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/redrooster/steelplate-gothic-rr/) or Aboutype's [Bitters](http://web.archive.org/web/20150219021459/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/aboutype/bitters/)  
you get pretty close. Storm's [Zeppelin](http://web.archive.org/web/20150219021459/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/storm/zeppelin/) is simply too wide.
